data.message: Hello, I was wondering if you could help me. I am apart of a page called Parenthood 101, recently the page has gotten hacked. We have been trying to get ahold of someone to help us get it back. The page is meant to help parents. They have posted stuff that was unrelated to the page, but have now taken it down. they are using our names one page as well to pretend to be us so they dont loose the fans. is there a way you can help us please??

replies.message: Hi Kayla. We’re sorry you’re experiencing this. If you think your account was taken over by someone else, we can help you secure it. Learn more: http://on.fb.me/1ux13Je -Chantal
